text: Chromium(IV) oxide is a chemical compound. It is used in audio cassettes. Its chemical formula is CrO2. It is made by heating chromium(VI) oxide and water at very high pressures. It is a black crystalline solid. ==Related pages== *Chromium(II) oxide *Chromium(III) oxide *Chromium(VI) oxide Category:Chromium compounds Category:Oxides
title: Chromium(IV) oxide
